page.title: 09AVONBOURNE SCHOOL
page.content:
Avonbourne is a Secondary School for Girls,aged 11 to 16.Each girl is placed in one of four houses, Bronte, Cavell, Fry or Nightingale, and then into a form within the house.
Everyone must wear uniform, from the first year to the fifth year. The uniform is a navy skirt, white blouse, navy jumper and a navy and white striped tie. The uniform for the sixth year changes each year.
The School is devided into two groups _ Junior, first to third year and Senior, fourth to sixth year. Some of the senior girls are prefects. If you are good, helpful and cheerful you could be awarded a girdle, a strip of material to match the colour of your house. Wendy Garraway.
